title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you download, build, and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, stream, and embed from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama with sync & async APIs for chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, and tool callers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user) installable via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama supporting chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async wrappers for the Ollama REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Browser extension that adds an Ollama-powered Copilot side-panel for any webpage.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to a local Ollama instance via the JS SDK.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model using slash commands.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper around ollama with prompt history, syntax highlight, and plugins.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models in channels/DMs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB and Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET client library for Ollama supporting chat, generate, and embeddings with async APIs.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing OpenAI-compatible endpoints that proxy to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that talks to Ollama with session memory and model picker widgets.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds an Ollama chat sidebar and code-generation commands.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client for Ollama with idiomatic interfaces for chat, generate, and model management.
